title:
A closed subset of Baire space not Medvedev equivalent to any closed set
  of Cantor space
abstract:
For mass problems $P,Q\subseteq {\mathbb{N}^\mathbb{N}}$ (Baire space), $P$
is Medvedev reducible to $Q$ ($P\leq_sQ$) if for some Turing funcional $\Phi$,
$\Phi(Q)\subseteq P$, and Medvedev equivalent to $Q$ if also $Q\leq_sP$. Shafer
asked if every closed problem $P$ is Medvedev equivalent to a closed problem
$Q$ with $Q\subseteq 2^\mathbb{N}$ (Cantor space). We show that this is not the
case.
